actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Cotton, Rice, and Sugar.
Referred to Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Cotton, Rice, and Sugar
Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a program under which persons sustaining losses of grain as a result of warehouse insolvencies shall be entitled to receive surplus commodities owned by the Commodity Credit Corporation as compensation for such losses.
short_title: Grain Warehouse Insolvency Payment-In-Kind Act of 1983

summary.text: Grain Warehouse Insolvency Payment-In-Kind Act of 1983 - Permits farmers who have suffered a loss as a result of a grain warehouse insolvency (as of January 1, 1978) to receive payment-in-kind commodities as compensation.

titles.title: Grain Warehouse Insolvency Payment-In-Kind Act of 1983

A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a program under which persons sustaining losses of grain as a result of warehouse insolvencies shall be entitled to receive surplus commodities owned by the Commodity Credit Corporation as compensation for such losses.
